news.title: Rajasthan: Stamp & registration revenue mop up shows good revival of realty market
news.para: During the April-August this year, the department earned Rs 2224.26 crore compared to Rs 1572.81 crore in the same period last year, posting a growth of over 41%.

news.title: Hyderabad civic body to acquire 260 properties for storm water drains development
news.para: In an effort to fix the city’s drainage system, GHMC’s Strategic Nala Development Programme (SNDP) was rolled out in November 2020 post the floods that created havoc in the city.

news.title: Ludhiana: Construction & demolition waste piles up, recycling project in deep abyss
news.para: The National Green Tribunal (NGT) had directed the MC to start operatiing this C&D waste processing plant in three months or pay a penalty of Rs 2 lakh.

news.title: Mumbai: Builders named in inquiry reports deny any role in trust land fraud
news.para: On January 10, 2014, the then Raigad collector had recommended to the Konkan divisional commissioner to file complaints against those named in the inquiry report, according to documents procured under the RTI by activist Rajeev Mishra.

news.title: NGT disposes plea against Goa Velha building complex
news.para: ​While the activists had alleged that the report of the expert committee formed based on NGT orders were faulty and malafide, the tribunal refused to accept this submission.

news.title: Nagpur improvement trust seeks user change of PU land, ground 'to help a builder'
news.para: ​The PU land is 0.4 hectare (43,056 sq ft), with change in reservation proposed for 0.33 hectare (36,199 sq ft) to residential, and remaining 0.067 hectare (7,212 sq ft) land left as parking.

news.title: Mumbai: Khar-based builder booked for cheating Dubai businessman
news.para: In his complaint, Shadab said the father-son duo approached his father Shabbir in 2014, seeking a financial aid of Rs 50 lakh and agreed to keep their flat at Kamal Vishranti at TPS 3 in Bandra as security with an additional interest of 21% as profit on the borrowed sum.

news.title: Pune: Realtor, two others booked in Rs 2.4 crore cheating case
news.para: Patil also accused Pashankar of assaulting him in the latter’s office when he demanded a refund after realising that the realtor had sold the two flats to third parties.

news.title: Pune civic body seals 10 properties, issues impounding notices to 9,000 tax defaulters
news.para: The civic body has also issued notices to the owners of another 9,000 commercial and residential properties asking them to clear their property tax dues immediately from the date of receiving the notice.

news.title: Over 78,000 property owners in Bengaluru wait for BBMP's penalty waiver
news.para: In February-March, it served system-generated notices to owners on charges of paying tax less than due for four assessment years from 2016-17 to 2019-20.

news.title: Mumbai: Two years later, 70 families hit by Malad wall crash yet to be rehabilitated
news.para: The families are still at the same spot where the retaining wall had crashed, killing neighbours doing heavy rain. While officials said 86 families were allotted flats at project-affected people (PAP) buildings in Mahul, 75 are still living in danger.

news.title: About 8,000 hectares of Aravalis in Faridabad not part of NCZ: Haryana government
news.para: In a letter to all the districts, principal secretary (town and country planning) AK Singh has said that the protected Aravalis should be defined according to a 1992 notification by the Centre, which says that the “specific areas” of the forests are limited to Gurugram in Haryana and Alwar in Rajasthan.

news.title: Real estate assets' information to be included in third set of Swiss bank details
news.para: India will get this month the complete information on flats, apartments and condominiums owned by Indians in Switzerland as also on earnings made from such properties to help it look into tax liabilities associated with those assets.

news.title: Supertech home buyers jittery after SC orders demolition of twin towers
news.para: On August 31, the Supreme Court ordered demolition of the twin 40-storey towers of Supertech's Emerald Court project in Noida here for violation of building by-laws.

news.title: The self-made Chinese billionaire battling to save debt-mired Evergrande
news.para: The 62-year-old -- also known as Hui Ka Yan in Cantonese -- was at one point China's richest man, with a taste for luxury labels, exclusive yachts and a nose for praising the Communist Party that steered the economy to a home ownership boom.
